mapper.insert: insert into product (PROD_ID, PROD_NBR, PROD_SYS_NBR, PROD_NAME, PROD_DESC, MANAGE_GRADE, EFF_DATE, EXP_DATE, PROD_COMP_TYPE, PROD_FUNC_TYPE, BILL_PROD_TYPE, PROD_USE_TYPE, BASE_OFFER_ID, MANAGE_REGION_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, ALIAS_NAME, REMARK, GRP_PROD_NBR) values (#{prodId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{prodNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodSysNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manageGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{prodCompType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodFuncType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billProdType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodUseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baseOfferId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{manageRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aliasName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grpProdNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update product set PROD_NBR = #{prodNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROD_SYS_NBR = #{prodSysNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROD_NAME = #{prodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROD_DESC = #{prodDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGE_GRADE = #{manageGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EFF_DATE = #{effDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXP_DATE = #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PROD_COMP_TYPE = #{prodCompType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROD_FUNC_TYPE = #{prodFuncType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BILL_PROD_TYPE = #{billProdType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROD_USE_TYPE = #{prodUseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BASE_OFFER_ID = #{baseOfferId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, MANAGE_REGION_ID = #{manageRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ALIAS_NAME = #{aliasName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRP_PROD_NBR = #{grpProdNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PROD_ID = #{prodId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select PROD_ID, PROD_NBR, PROD_SYS_NBR, PROD_NAME, PROD_DESC, MANAGE_GRADE, EFF_DATE, EXP_DATE, PROD_COMP_TYPE, PROD_FUNC_TYPE, BILL_PROD_TYPE, PROD_USE_TYPE, BASE_OFFER_ID, MANAGE_REGION_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, ALIAS_NAME, REMARK, GRP_PROD_NBR from product where PROD_ID = #{prodId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select PROD_ID, PROD_NBR, PROD_SYS_NBR, PROD_NAME, PROD_DESC, MANAGE_GRADE, EFF_DATE, EXP_DATE, PROD_COMP_TYPE, PROD_FUNC_TYPE, BILL_PROD_TYPE, PROD_USE_TYPE, BASE_OFFER_ID, MANAGE_REGION_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, ALIAS_NAME, REMARK, GRP_PROD_NBR from product
